description: Reach sinuosity (reach length along the thalweg divided by straight line distance between the bottom of the reach and the top of the reach, unit: none)
Strahler stream order of the site from the provider dataset (unit: none).
Average bankfull width depth ratio for the reach (unit: meters).
Average bankfull height measured from water surface across transects (unit: meters).
Average bankfull width across transects for the reach (unit: meters).
Number of cross sections included in the average bankfull width calculation (units: count of measurements)
Mean slope of water surface from the bottom of the reach to the top of the reach (expressed as percent, unit: none).
Mean thalweg depth. Metric of how deep the water was at the site (unit: meters).
Length of sampling reach measured along the thalweg (unit: meters).
Average wetted width across transects (unit: meters).
Percent of the sample reach (linear extent) classified as pool habitat (expressed as a percent, unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Average of the residual pool depth values for all pools in a reach. Residual pool depth the difference of the pool tail depth from the max depth (unit: meters).
Measured angle of the stream bank (unit: degrees).
Percent of 42 banks lacking visible signs of active erosion (e.g., slump, slough, fracture) expressed as a percent (unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 16th percentile of measured particles (unit: millimeters).
Median diameter of bed surface particle size corresponding to the areal median (50th percentile of measured particles) (unit: millimeters).
Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 84th percentile of measured particles (unit: millimeters).
Percent of the stream bed area that is composed of particles with a b axis greater than 4098 millimeters (expressed as percent, units: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Percent of the stream bed area that is comprised of particles with a b axis less than 2 millimeters (expressed as percent, units: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Average percent fine sediment (less than 6 millimeters) on the pool tail (expressed as a percent, unit: none, min: 0, max: 100).
Average percent fine sediment (less than 2 millimeters) on the pool tail (expressed as percent, unit: none).
Average percent fine sediment (less than 6 millimeters) on the pool tail (expressed as a percent, unit: none).
Measure of the concentration of ionized materials in water, or the ability of water to conduct electrical current. Used as a measure of mineral / ionic concentration (unit: ppm or parts per million).
Measured pH value (unit: none, min: 0, max:14).
Measured specific conductance value. The specific conductance is conductivity standardized to 25 degrees C (unit: uS/cm or microSiemens per centimeter).
Measured total nitrogen value (unit: ug/L or micrograms per liter).
Measured total phosphorous value (unit: ug/L or micrograms per liter).
Average water clarity as measured by the suspended solids in the water column (unit: NTU or Nephelometric Turbidity unit)
